fieldset.name: customcode
fieldset.label: Template Header And Footer Custom Code

field.label: Using text fields below you can put your custom code in the document head and in the footer. This option is very usable if you would like to put Google Analytics or any other 3rd parties.

field.name: headcode
field.label: Insert code into template header
field.description: This field allows to put the code between [head] and [/head]

field.name: footercode
field.label: Insert code into template footer
field.description: This field allows to put the code before the closing [/body] tag

field.name: cam_turnOn
field.label: Turn Slideshow ON/OFF
field.description: Set On if you would like to use built-in slideshow. Set OFF if you are planning to use any 3rd party extensions.

field.name: cam_autoAdvance
field.label: Turn ON/OFF autoplaying
field.description: Turn On if you would like to your slideshow to play automatically once your website load

field.name: cam_mobileAutoAdvance
field.label: Turn ON/OFF autoplaying for mobiles
field.description: Turn On if you would like to your slideshow to play automatically once your website load on mobile devices

field.name: cam_slideOn
field.label: Slide Effect On
field.description: Decide if the transition effect will be applied to the current (prev) or the next slide

field.name: cam_thumbnails
field.label: Turn ON/OFF thumbnails
field.description: Turn On thumbnails for slideshow

field.name: cam_time
field.label: Slide Duration (ms)
field.description: Milliseconds between the end of the sliding effect and the start of the nex one

field.name: cam_transPeriod
field.label: Animation Duration (ms)
field.description: Lenght of the sliding effect in milliseconds

field.name: cam_cols
field.label: Columns for images transitions
field.description: Type a number of columns you want to split images during transitions

field.name: cam_rows
field.label: Rows for images transitions
field.description: Type a number of rows you want to split images during transitions

field.name: cam_slicedCols
field.label: Columns for sliced images transitions
field.description: Type a number of columns you want to slice images during transitions

field.name: cam_slicedRows
field.label: Rows for sliced images transitions
field.description: Type a number of rows you want to slice images during transitions

field.name: cam_fx
field.label: Choose FX Effects
field.description: Select a fx effect for the slides transitions.

field.name: cam_fx_multiple_on
field.label: Use Multiple FX Effects
field.description:
You can also use more than one effect, just type an effects names in field below. Separate values with commas:

simpleFade, scrollRight, scrollBottom

field.label:
FX Effects:
simpleFade, curtainTopLeft, curtainTopRight, curtainBottomLeft,
curtainBottomRight, curtainSliceLeft, curtainSliceRight, blindCurtainTopLeft,
blindCurtainTopRight, blindCurtainBottomLeft, blindCurtainBottomRight,
blindCurtainSliceBottom, blindCurtainSliceTop, stampede,
mosaic, mosaicReverse, mosaicRandom, mosaicSpiral, mosaicSpiralReverse,
topLeftBottomRight, bottomRightTopLeft, bottomLeftTopRight,
bottomLeftTopRight, scrollLeft, scrollRight, scrollHorz, scrollBottom, scrollTop

field.name: cam_fx_multi
field.label: Multiple FX Effects
field.description:
Type and separate an effects names with commas, for example:

simpleFade, scrollRight, scrollBottom

field.name: cam_gridDifference
field.label: Grid Difference
field.description: To make the grid blocks slower than the slices, this value must be smaller than Animation Duration

field.name: cam_height
field.label: Height
field.description: Here you can type pixels (for example 300px), a percentage (relative to the width of the slideshow, for instance 50%) or auto

field.name: cam_minHeight
field.label: Min Height
field.description: Here you can type pixels (for example 300px), a percentage (relative to the width of the slideshow, for instance 50%) or you can also leave it empty

field.name: cam_hover
field.label: Pause on state hover
field.description: Pause on state hover. Not available for mobile devices

field.name: cam_loader
field.label: Loader
field.description: Choose loader style. Even if you choose pie, old browsers like IE8 can't display it. They will display always a loading bar instead.

field.name: cam_barDirection
field.label: Bar Direction
field.description: Choose Bar Direction

field.name: cam_barPosition
field.label: Bar Position
field.description: Choose Bar Position

field.name: cam_pieDiameter
field.label: Pie Diameter
field.description: Type Pie Diameter

field.name: cam_piePosition
field.label: Pie Position
field.description: Choose Pie Position

field.name: cam_loaderColor
field.label: Loader Color
field.description: Choose Loader Color

field.name: cam_loaderBgColor
field.label: Loader Background Color
field.description: Choose Loader Background Color

field.name: cam_loaderOpacity
field.label: Loader Opacity
field.description: Choose loader opacity

field.name: cam_loaderPadding
field.label: Loader Padding
field.description: Choose how many empty pixels you want to display between the loader and its background

field.name: cam_loaderStroke
field.label: Loader Stroke
field.description: The thickness both of the pie loader and of the bar loader. Remember: for the pie, the loader thickness must be less than a half of the Pie Diameter

field.name: cam_navigation
field.label: Navigation
field.description: Display navigation buttons

field.name: cam_playPause
field.label: Play/Pause
field.description: Display play/pause buttons

field.name: cam_navigationHover
field.label: Navigation Hover
field.description: If true the navigation button (prev, next and play/stop buttons) will be visible on hover state only, if false they will be visible always

field.name: cam_mobileNavHover
field.label: Mobile Navigation Hover
field.description: If true the navigation button on Mobile devices (prev, next and play/stop buttons) will be visible on hover state only, if false they will be visible always

field.name: cam_opacityOnGrid
field.label: Opacity On Grid
field.description: Decide to apply a fade effect to blocks and slices. If your slideshow is fullscreen or just big, it is strongly recommended to set it to false to have a smoother effect

field.name: cam_pagination
field.label: Pagination
field.description: Display Pagination

field.name: cam_pauseOnClick
field.label: Pause On Click
field.description: This option stops the slideshow when you click the sliders.

field.name: cam_portrait
field.label: Portrait
field.description: Select true if you don't want that your images are cropped

field.name: cam_caption_y_position
field.label: Specify the slide caption position
field.description: Specify the slide caption position - this is a space between a slide caption and top od the slideshow area

field.name: cam_caption_width
field.label: Specify the slide caption width
field.description: Specify the slide caption width. You can use % value or px.

field.name: bodybackgroundimage
field.label: Background Image
field.description: Select your background image. If empty simple background color chosen below will be used.

field.name: usetheme
field.label: Built-in Theme
field.description: Select ON to use one of the built-in themes. Select OFF to customize the template colour scheme.

field.label: To choose your own colors below simply click the text field to open the color selector tool.
